GameData.Language_en_US:
Yeah.
Sure thing.
Yeah, I can live with that.
Okay, cool.
I'm fine with that.
Yes, I agree.
Alright.
Really? Then I'll push you down with pure danmaku power!
My, oh my, that's suprising. We have no choice but to put up a fight!
Oh my, an unscheduled performance? Well then, it's time to rock!
It's best that you give us these. It could help prevent more problems in the future.
Could you please give us some help and lend us these. We're in need of some help. I'll pay you back, I promise!
If you aren't using any of these, would you kindly give these to us?
No.
I'm sorry, I don't agree.
Nope.
Sorry, that's a no.
My friends don't agree, so do I.
No, I can't agree on that.
No, sorry.
Bye!
See you later!
Leaving already? See you then!
Goodbye!
Come back later, okay?
Leaving so soon? See you later!
Please do return, okay?
Need anything?
Anything I can do for you?
You came to see my performance?
Heya, need anything?
What's up?
Did you need anything?
It's you, hi.
Let's hear it, then.
I hear you, speak up.
Speak up, what's the matter?
Please do tell us.
You got a problem? We're listening.
Is this about concert tickets?
Personal issues? You know who to talk to!
How suprising... I surrender!
This isn't enough. You need to tune it better.
The value we get from this is lower than the bass drum, you know.
We'll get absolutely nothing from this!
A little bit more tuning and we're good to go!
Maybe a little more, for a friend like me?
You can do better, I believe you!
Sorry, we'll need more.
Sorry, that's not enough.
Sorry, please tune it up.
That's not gonna help us at all.
I want to say yes, but I'm sure my friends won't like that.
Sorry, no can do.
Can't argue with that.
Great! Now that that's done, would you like to stay for a live performance?
Ok, deal.
Let's set aside our petty differences with a friendly trade, what say you?
Would you like to trade with me?
We wan't some of those, but do you wan't what we have right here?
Absolutely no, to accept that would be the same as insulting my friends!
I'm really sorry, I can't help you.
No, we need these. Sorry.
Alright I'll give it to you. But stay away from my friends, okay?
We'll help you out, please take it. We got you covered, don't worry!
Alright, take it, we won't be needing it.
Ah that's too bad.
You got me.
Well that sucks.
How surprising.
Hey, no hard feelings okay? It's all in good fun, right?
-
Maybe we should change the subject. -
Still a no. -
I can't change my mind. -
Back so soon? -
Does this mean you have time for concerts? -
Why did you return? -
Sorry, I have to ask you to leave if you have nothing else to say.
-
Is something the matter? -
Hey, you want to watch our concert? -
Welcome back, my good friend. -
Hi. -
Heya, need anything? -
What's up, what would you like to talk about? -
Oh, it' you. Please make this quick, we're busy. -
What is it this time? -
What do you want? -
It's almost the end of our performance, huh? -
We're exhausted, I can't hear my beats anymore. Have you come to stop this war? -
I think that's enough for now, let's stop this war. -
We had enough of this. Let's end this. -
Let's make peace. We're not geting anywhere. -
We'll never surrender to you! -
We're all fired up and ready to beat you! -
Can you hear these beats of mine? It will show you how I feel! -
Our Research Agreement is looking really good so far! -
I really hope I can trust you again once I can forgive you about that broken promise. -
Heya, friend! -
{1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} sure is going down, right? -
My beats will make {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey} regret facing us! -
I look forward to fighting with {1_ThirdPlayerName:textkey}, what about you? -
What do you want? Shouldn't you be out there fighting? -
Good luck in your war, show 'em who's the boss! -
If you would like to fight with all those troops, just tell me now so we can get it over with. I'm ready! -
Your troops around my borders are worrying me, I hope there will be no problems. -
Your expansion is huge problem to us. Please stop this immediately! -
Sorry, I have to tell you that your expansion is preventing us from expanding. The number of tsukumogami are increasing and we need more room. Please tone it down a bit. -
Your plot buying is huge problem to us. Please stop this immediately! -
Sorry, I have to tell you that your plot buying is causing problems for us. Small borders mean our concerts are less spacious. Please tone it down a bit. -
Your military is strong! You'll definitely win all of your fights, for sure. -
Your economy is amazing! I think some of my friends would like to help out too. We feel better if we're useful. -
Concert tours in your nation would be easy to arrange, there isn't much choice. Building more cities would do both of us a favor. -
Your army is worryingly small. I'm worried about your people being invaded by barbarians. -
You don't know when to give up, do you? Why don't you quietly give up and apologize to everyone? -
Why are you still coming back? -
I really don't want to be bothered by you. Please leave if you have nothing else to do. -
You still want to talk to me after all of that? I'm honored, really. -
{1_PlayerName} is not a good person. Please don't hang around with them for too long. -
I'm happy that you got along with {1_PlayerName}! We should hold a celebration party, with live performances, of course. -
{1_PlayerName} is a nice person. Please don't denounce them, they are quite friendly. -
Seems like we have the same person we disagree with. While that's nice, please do watch your back too, they won't take your denouncement for granted. I'm here if you need any help. -
Sorry, I don't know you well enough. Let's get to know each other first, okay? -
I haven't known you well enough yet. Later in the future we can call each other friends. -
{1_CivName} needs to be denounced by us. That should make them learn to be nicer. -
We need to declare war against {1_CivName}. They have gone too far with their ways. -
That wasn't very nice of you, betraying friends.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
Hey! That's not nice! Please don't betray your friends![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
I'm really sorry for this, but I just can't keep up with your ways.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]They have publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
Is that how it's going to be? Very well. -
That sucks, I really wish I could've avoided this. -
I'm happy that you got along with {1_PlayerName}! We should hold a celebration party, with live performances, of course. -
{1_PlayerName} is not a good person. Please don't hang around with them for too long. -
{1_PlayerName} is a nice person. Please don't denounce them, they are not enemies. -
Seems like we have the same person we disagree with. While that's nice, please do watch your back too, they won't take your denouncement for granted. I'm here if you need any help. -
I befriended {1_CivName} because you two were just so friendly with each other. Let's all hold a party! -
I agree that {1_CivName} is just not nice to everyone. I hope that with our denouncements, everyone will know and understand. -
{1_CivName} is a bad influence, you know? Please try not to get influenced by them. -
{1_CivName} is definitely worth befriending. I hope that by befriending them, I will make you understand.
-
Please tone down on your expansion. We need to be settling cities, more and more tools are being discarded and I need to give them new homes. -
I thought you were better than that, but it looks like you can't be trusted. -
All those lands you brought were desperately needed by these poor tools. They need space too, you know. It's getting really crowded here. -
Please tone down on your plot buying. We need some space too. -
I thought you were better than that, but it looks like you can't be trusted. -
Your City-state friend here has been abusing their tools lately. I'm going to teach them a lesson, and save those poor things. Are you still going to support their misdeeds? -
Apparently, we are attacking a City-state you are protecting. I think this was some kind of mistake, I'll resolve this as soon as possible. I hope you're cool with this? -
Pacts of Cooperation shouldn't be possible, but here we are. -
Heya, let's be friends. We'll be the dynamic duo! -
I think we're meant for each other. As friends of course. Let's make a public declaration! -
I'm sorry, but I have to tell you to stop being nasty to others.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
You don't have the heart to treat people with care, let alone giving tools like us the care we deserved.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]([COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]She has publicly denounced us! NOTE: You are not at war.[ENDCOLOR]) -
Oops. -
Oops. -
Oops. -
Oops. -
Oops. -
Oops. -
Oops. -
Oops. -
I need all the help I can get to fight {1_PlayerName:textkey}. Are you in? -
{1_PlayerName:textkey} needs to be taught a lesson. Together we can save the poor souls abused by them. Shall we? -
The time for battle has come. Are you ready? -
It sucks that as a tsukumogami, I can't forgive easily, it's in my nature to be vengeful. Even so, I've tried my best, but I just can't forgive you anymore. -
I wish we were friends, but it looks like we really aren't meant for each other. It sucks that you are now my enemy. -
You are a very impressive leader, you know that? I can learn a lot from you. I'll definitely give you the VIP spot in our concerts. -
Your skills as a leader is impressive! Since seeing those Taiko Drum Masters, I haven't seen anyone with such talent. -
You are a really great leader, someone should give you a title of some sort, don't you think? -
My friends say that you remind them of their past owners. Abusive and uncaring. I think you fit that description pretty well. -
You are great friends with {1_MinorCivName:textkey}! That's great! But it gets really awkward if they have to chose their best friend, so I think it's best if you stop getting too close to them, okay?
-
You look like you need help. Do you want to join our civilization? -
Hey, just so you know, you're really behind. You gotta keep up with the beats of the world. Do you want me to guide you with my beats? -
Would you like to use us as your tools? I guarantee that it will bring your civilization a good 100 years forward! -
I worry that barbarians might overrun your civilization. I think you should improve your military. -
This nuke is becoming a tsukumogami if I don't use it soon. That's gonna bring too much trouble. -
You should stop being such a huge bully. It's for your own benefit. -
Man, your people look miserable. Reminds me of newborn tsukumogami. Abandoned and uncared for. -
We wanted to start another concert tour in your nation, but then we realized we do not have any more new cities to visit too. It's getting really boring performing in the same cities over and over again. Why don't you settle more cities? -
Our concerts in your nation was so... bland. It sucks having to perform in front of thin air. On the other hand, we're not getting any noise complaints so I guess it's fine? -
Do your people love music? Perhaps some mask plays? They seemed so confused about the concept when we performed in front of them.
-
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} announces to the world that it is now protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}. Attacking the City-State will greatly damage relations and may lead to war. -
{2_MajorCivName:textkey} has taken back its guarantee of protecting {1_MinorCivName:textkey}.
-
No. -
Alright, we won't settle near you, I promise. -
No, we need to have some freedom on where to settle. -
Alright, I'm happy to be your partner, then! -
Sorry, no can do. -
I'm, sorry, but I have to decline. -
Oops. -
Sure thing, we'll show 'em who's the boss! -
Sure, but give us ten turns to prepare. Then I'll be ready to rock! -
If it means that it will keep my friends safe, I accept. -
It doesn't look like I can refuse this, so I accept. -
Really funny, teasing me like that. You got me there! -
I refuse. You'll need to do better than that. -
No! I will not let you manipulate us just because we're tools! -
If I gave all of that away my friends would kill me. -
My friends will have me recycled if I gave all of those away. -
Another demand so soon? Why do you have to be so greedy? -
No! That was too soon, don't you think?
-
... -
It's time we end this, it's getting boring. Is this enough? -
We're bored of fighting. Will this end the war? -
It's best that you give us these. It could help prevent more problems in the future. -
Could you please give us some help and lend us these. I'll pay you back, I promise! -
Here, take these. It will help you out. -
Opening our borders means it will be a lot easier for us to do a concert tour. Of course that also means you can come over to our lands too. -
I think we shoud make a Research Agreement.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE](Agreeing will not form a Research Agreement yet) -
Let's sign a Research Agreement. We're definitely good in researching, trust me! We're tools after all. -
This deal brought us closer, as friends of course. Shall we renew this deal? -
This deal needs some tuning before we can renew it. I need you to tune up your offer.
-
That's very nice of you, thanks! -
I'll remember you for this, thank you. -
This will help us a lot, thank you for your generosity. -
Done, and done. -
I'm cool with that. -
Deal! -
Thank you for your cooperation. -
I hope this will prevent problems in the future between us. -
Okay, I forgive you. -
I can't accept that, sorry. -
I'm sorry, but that isn't acceptable. -
Sorry, no can do. -
Accepting that would be an insult to my friends. -
I'd rather be recycled than accept that. -
I'm cool if you're cool with this. -
I'm willing to accept this if you are. -
Does this look reasonable to you? -
This should do, right? -
I don't think this will ever work. -
I can't find a way to make this work.
-
We'll never back down against you! -
You're cruel, you know that? -
If you think that we're weak, then we'll prove you wrong. We'll fight ''til our very end! -
If it's against you, we'll fight until we can no longer move! -
Very well, I hope this will be a lesson for you to never underestimate us tools! -
You really hate us that much do you? Even going so far as attacking us when we have the numbers. -
You want to fight that badly? Well I won't be very merciful, if it's against you! -
I won't be holding back against you, this is an all out battle. -
Oh my, an unscheduled performance? I'm definitely in! -
Let's get to it then! Show me what you've got! -
I'm ready to make some noise too! -
An unscheduled performance? I'll improvise whatever I wasn't prepared for! -
An unscheduled performance? I'll make sure the whole world can hear our song! -
It's sad that it had to come to this. -
Hey, no hard feelings in this battle, right? -
But I thought we were friends?
-
The time's come for tools to rise to power! Come, my drummer! Engrave your beat into this very battle! -
Now's the time where we tools will finally get what we deserve. Freedom! I will give your tools the freedom they've deserved after many years! Come, my drummer! Let your visionary beat resound throughout the world! -
We've come to save our fellow tools. This feeling may no longer be held back! Come, my drummer! Awaken primal emotions with your soul's beat! -
I shouldn't have trusted you. -
It's getting too crowded here, we need to move into your lands! -
Our place is becoming junkyard, we gotta move to your territory! -
This will make us one step closer to victory! Come, my drummer! Let your primal beat echo throughout the world! -
This is my time to shine! Come, my drummer! Let your once-in-a-lifetime beat resound! -
My time to strike has come! Come, my drummer! Use your unknown pulse tonight to make my enemy "beat it"! -
Well, I don't have much choice, do I? Let's do this! -
We're backed to a corner, we have no choice but to fight you! -
I'm sorry, but it looks like we can't be friends. -
While it's not in my nature to betray people, I will not stand still in the face of your actions! -
Your nation is about to crumble. I'll your tools before they turn to dust! -
I'm sorry that I had to do this. -
I'm sorry, I really wish I could avoid this. -
I told you that if you give me what I wanted, this wouldn't have to happen.
-
So, what's it going to be? -
Well, what do you think? -
Let's hear it. -
How very kind of you! -
Awesome, thanks! -
No. We're not done yet! -
It's not over yet, we must continue this! -
The performance's just getting started!
-
Alright. -
Great! -
Cool. -
Thanks! -
Thank you! -
Thanks, I'll remember this. -
That sucks. -
Oh well then. -
Aw, okay then. -
So be it. -
So be it, then. -
Well, so be it. -
Hey, thanks for returning our lost worker! I'll remember this! -
Hey! That's not nice of you! Stealing our land! -
I knew you were eager to fight. We won't back down against you! -
I'll have to trust you, for now. -
Very well, a war it is then! -
Would you like a marching band to go with your army, then? -
That sucks. I feel bad for your tools. -
Good choice, please do not follow them. -
Ah, well, I gotta get this straight as soon as possible then. -
That sucks. -
I hope you'll change your mind. -
Cool. Let's put this aside, then. -
Cool. Let's put this aside, then. -
Cool. Let's put this aside, then. -
Cool. Let's put this aside, then. -
Cool. Let's put this aside, then. -
We have nukes! It's best if you guys be nice with each other, okay?
-
You believe in Freedom too? Awesome! All things deserve to be free no matter who or what they are, am I right? -
You believe in Order too? Awesome! Working for the greater good is what brings us together, right? -
You believe in Autocracy too? Awesome! Let's be leaders the world would look up too! -
We caught your spy sneaking around our territory. Tell all of your spies to leave us alone immediately! -
We caught your spy watching our concerts without a ticket. At least tell your spies to pay for their tickets. Also tell them to not snoop around us, okay? -
Alright, cool. -
Oh my, that sucks, it seems like we'll have to tune up our security. -
Okay, I'll tell them to leave you alone. -
I'm sorry, but I need to make sure that you're not plotting against anyone. -
Thanks for warning us about this {@1_CivAdjective} plot. We'll be prepared. -
We found out that {1_PlayerName} is plotting against you. Please watch your back. -
We found out that {1_PlayerName} is planning to attack {2_CityName}. Please watch your back. -
We found out that {1_PlayerName} is planning to attack you. Please watch your back. -
We found out that {1_PlayerName} is planning to attack {2_CityName} from the sea. Please watch your back. -
We found out that {1_PlayerName} is planning to attack from the sea. Please watch your back. -
Back when I was just a simple taiko drum, I would see all kinds of things, but I've always made sure to not spy at people intentionally. You should have assigned your spy as a diplomat instead, but that's a bit too late now. -
I regret sending my agent to spy on you, I am truly sorry about this. I hope you'll be able to forgive me. -
My, you sure got me. -
I would appreciate it if you would stop spying on us. Thanks. -
Hey, I know we're not very religious, but we need to keep our own religion since it feeds us with the spiritual power we need. Please stop sending your missionaries to us. -
That sucks, but this is what I get for doing something like this. -
Thank you, I swear to never repeat this mistake again. -
Thanks for being considerate. -
Oh, this is gonna be bad for us... -
Okay, we won't bother your people with missionaries any more. -
No, your people need to know about the importance of tools! -
Given up yet? -
We'll forgive you if you're gonna surrender.
-
You're gonna do something about it? Then do it! -
Okay, we'll put this whole issue aside. -
I'm confident that this is what I'm supposed to do for my friends. -
Thank you for understanding that I needed to do this. -
Sorry, that deal is way too out of our league. -
I can't match that offer!
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} is awesome! I'm definitely supporting you.
Your proposal to the {1_LeagueName} is not cool. I'm sorry but you've lost my support.
Heya, I'm here to thank you for your support at the {1_LeagueName}. I'll repay you for this, I promise.
Your support in {1_LeagueName} was a huge help for us. Thank you so much!
You took part in making my proposal fail at the {1_LeagueName}. I'm not happy with that.
My proposal to the {1_LeagueName} failed because of you. Are you trying to be enemies with me?
Hey, thanks for getting us to be the host of the next World Congress. Together we'll be the best of partners.
Are you trying to rescue lost artifacts too? While that's great, I think you should just leave this to me, especially when they are in my territory, you know.
Sorry, but no. I must continue to rescue lost artifacts!
Alright, alright! I'll stop digging up your artifacts.
Oh my, seems like I'll have a rival.
Thank you for understanding.
Everyone wants Freedom here, said that they were inspired by you. It will be disasterous if everyone was completely free, you know!
Everyone wants Order here, said they were inspired by you. Solos will disappear if everyone was to work together all the time, you know!
Everyone wants Autocracy here, said they were inspired by you. The conductor isn't the one who controls the entire flow of music, you know!
Your people are crying out for Freedom. You should just let them express their thoughts and feelings!
Your people are crying out for Order. You should unite them together so that they may build a better future!
Your people are crying out for Autocracy. You should be that one leader who will lead them to greatness!
Hey, you switched to Freedom. Awesome! All things deserve to be free no matter who or what they are, am I right?
Hey, you switched to Order. Awesome! Working for the greater good is what brings us together, right?
Hey, you switched to Autocracy. Awesome! Let's be leaders the world would look up too!
Oh my, we no longer have our own culture... I worry that everyone else will suffer the same fate.
Hey, I love how you are now taking good care of your tools. They'll definitely be great tsukumogami!
